pkgmetadata.longdescription: Miscellaneous convenience functions and dataset // This package contains some miscellaneous convenience functions, to create a matrix of dummy columns from a factor, to determine whether x lies in range [a,b], to add a rectangular bracket to an existing plot, and to convert frequencies between Hz, semitones, mel and Bark. This package also contains an example data set of a stratified sample of 80 talkers of Dutch.
